programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
programme.desc: Sameer, a hot-tempered guy relocates to Goa, where he falls in love with Rani. However, his new roommate Sunny puts a spoke in the wheel upon his arrival and Rani finds herself in a dilemma as she starts liking both Sameer and Sunny.

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer in show business, encourages his wife and a talented singer, Uma to take up singing as a career. However, his pride is wounded and their marital bliss is threatened when Uma's popularity surpasses his own.

programme.title: Pyar Hi Pyar
programme.desc: A CID officer Vijay is assigned to find Kavita's missing father. He ends up falling for her and tries to woo her, blissfully unaware that a seasoned criminal is out to sabotage his fragile family and love life.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, an heir to millions of riches, is devoted to his manipulative stepmother who ploys to extort his wealth. But when Raju's newly-wed wife sees through her plan, she staunchly opposes her, which sets off a war of wits between the two women.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four slack and vagabond conmen learn about a hidden treasure from a dying thief and race against time to claim it. Meanwhile, they are also being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hell-bent on finding the treasure and keeping it all to himself.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.
